title: United Liberation Front of Asom
summary: The United Liberation Front of Asom (ULFA) is an armed separatist organisation operating in the Northeast Indian state of Assam.[1][2][3] It seeks to establish an independent sovereign nation state of Assam for the indigenous Assamese people through an armed struggle in the Assam conflict. The Government of India banned the organisation in 1990 citing it as a terrorist organisation,[4] while the United States Department of State lists it under "other groups of concern."[5]
